attributes.action: Make street parties legal for one day a year too stop the divide in the country
attributes.additional_details: We want too make street parties legal one day a year.
attributes.background: To create street parties and make them legal nationwide for one day a year to party away the divide politicians have created in the country

rejection.details:
It's already legal to hold a street party if you get the right permissions so we aren't sure what further action you would like taken.

You can find out more here:

https://www.gov.uk/organise-street-party
